original: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tālukaiḥ akṣarâikâika tu nôpalabhyate //
analyzed: na ca kaṇṭha gatā na tālukaiḥ tu

original: sāmagripratītyaś ca sā vācam anubudhivaśena niścarī /
analyzed: ca sā vācam anu budhi vaśena niścarī

original: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tad īdṛśīṃ sarvavācaḥ pratiśrutakôpamāḥ //
analyzed: kṣaṇikām vaśikām tat īdṛśīm sarva vācaḥ

original: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgatim /
analyzed: yathā tantri pratītya dāru ca hasta vyāyāma trayebhiḥ saṃgatim

original: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto 'yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /

analyzed: vidiśaḥ diśaḥ sarva mārgataḥ śabdam anāgamanam na labhyate

original: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
analyzed: hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarva saṃskāra gatam pravartate

analyzed: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati

analyzed: śūnyatā na kvacid devāḥ na nāgāḥ rākṣasāḥ

analyzed: manuṣyāḥ vmanuṣyāḥ vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate

analyzed: nāmnā hi nāma tā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate

analyzed: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ

analyzed: na ctpannaḥ niruddhaḥ vā kasya na amha pṛcchasi

iti śikṣāsamuccaye smṛti upasthāna paricchedaḥ trayodaśaḥ
